author: Sephiko

text:
lol you can make room and just rent the game if you're ever in the mood :P

I tried a ZNES emulator -that someone stuck on a school computer- once and didn't like it, so I stick to consoles n' controllers.
My comp wouldn't be able to handle one anyways, poor thing's an oldie with little memory.
author: Sephiko

text:

Don't worry, there are evil dudes in the tunnels.

text:
I'm doin this game right now, about 30 hours in. Wild Arms is a good series, although I think it started a downward spiral after Wild Arms 3. 

But it's a good song, one of many good songs in Wild Arms!
author: Boyce18

text:
It IS area music :P

It plays in a few tunnels (dungeons) that give off a nice twilit atmosphere (Wayward Path, Starlit Path etc.).
author: Sephiko

text:

I went through the whole soundtrack again and liked some others more, but this'll always be special to me :P
